m_szDocTitle: Chinese firm creates 'world's tallest 3D-printed building' | Cities | The Guardian
m_szDocSumamry: City links Chinese firm creates 'world's tallest 3D-printed building' City links: This week’s best city stories take a look at 3D-printed housing in Suzhou, a vision of a self-sufficient city in the desert, the urban projects copying the High Line – and the safest city in the world Want to live in a 3D-printed apartment block? Now’s your chance.
